item.description:
An evening to benefit the 4th Annual Hartford International Film Festival: Recession Edition taking place Saturday, November 7 and Sunday, November 8, 2009.

FRIDAY OCTOBER 16, 2009
LA PALOMA SABENERA COFFEEHOUSE
405 CAPITOL AVENUE, HARTFORD
5-8 pm

Suggested Donation: $10.
Complimentary Food and $2 Drinks

Get a peek at some of the featured films at this year's festival as well as some of your past favorites.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be collecting money at the door

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: Hartford International Film Festival Benefit
